pullRequest.title: [#1577] switched order of while condition to make sure that we dont skip any things that are put to request queue
pullRequest.bodyText:
[#1577] switched order of while condition to make sure that we dont skip any things that are put to request queue
Fixes #1577
Signed-off-by: Christian Dietrich christian.dietrich@itemis.de

nodes.bodyText: my tests over the weekend with the reproducer main as well as with my customers production tests look good so far.

commit.message:

any things that are put to request queue

Fixes #1577

Signed-off-by: Christian Dietrich <christian.dietrich@itemis.de>
